title: Donald Trump's hair blown apart by the wind
shortDescription: The reality of Donald Trump's unique combover is revealed as the president takes a windy walk towards Air Force One
longDescription: Footage, widely shared on Feb 5, 2018, showed Trump’s hair being dramatically swept about in a blustery wind, revealing what appeared to be a large hairless patch at the rear of his head and adding to longstanding speculation about the exact nature of Trump’s mane. More details at: https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2018/feb/07/donald-trump-hair-wind
